product_name: Garmin Edge Touring Plus Bike Computer
long_description: A navigation aid for cyclists, the Garmin Edge Touring Plus GPS Bike Computer guides you to the best rides for leisure, training and errands and offers a heart-rate monitor and ANT+ compatability.
short_description: A navigation aid for cyclists, the Garmin Edge Touring Plus GPS Bike Computer guides you to the best rides for leisure, training and errands and offers a heart-rate monitor and ANT+ compatability.
